queryMap.list_sql: SELECT max(USER_NAME) as USER_NAME , max(USER_TEL1) as USER_TEL1, GROUP_KEY ,count(GROUP_KEY) cnt FROM reserve_info a where a.RESERVE_STATE='1' and RESERVE_DATE between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -10 DAY) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 DAY) and DATEDIFF( now(), LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP) between 2 and 3 and LOGIN_ID=? group by GROUP_KEY
